title: Les Maries de L'an II
description: A few year before the French Revolution, Nicolas kills one of his wife's lover and must flee to America in order to avoid police prosecution. While in exile he becomes a successful spice merchant. Soon Nicolas is engaged to be married to a wealthy heiress. However, he must return to France, by now in the throes of the revolution, to obtain divorce from his wife and  Credits: Producer, Alain Poire ; director, Jean-Paul Rappeneau ; writers, Daniel Boulanger, Maurice Clavel, Claude Sautet, Jean-Paul Rappeneau ; photography, Claude Renoir ; music, Michel Legrand ; art direction, Willy Holt, Alexandre Trauner. Cast: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Marlene Jobert, Michel Auclair, Laura Antonelli, Sami Frey, Denise Peron, Julien Guiomar, Charles Denner, Pierre Brasseur, Mario David.
